1.name: The Wicker Man
1.description: A Police Sergeant is sent to a Scottish island village in search of a missing girl who the townsfolk claim never existed. Stranger still are the rites that take place there.

2.name: The Exorcist
2.description: When a teenage girl is possessed by a mysterious entity, her mother seeks the help of two priests to save her daughter.

3.name: American Graffiti
3.description: A couple of high school grads spend one final night cruising the strip with their buddies before they go off to college.

4.name: Mean Streets
4.description: A small-time hood aspires to work his way up the ranks of a local mob.

5.name: Don't Look Now
5.description: A married couple grieving the recent death of their young daughter are in Venice when they encounter two elderly sisters, one of whom is psychic and brings a warning from beyond.

6.name: The Sting
6.description: Two grifters team up to pull off the ultimate con.

7.name: Papillon
7.description: A man befriends a fellow criminal as the two of them begin serving their sentence on a dreadful prison island, which inspires the man to plot his escape.

8.name: La montaña sagrada
8.description: In a corrupt, greed-fueled world, a powerful alchemist leads a Christ-like character and seven materialistic figures to the Holy Mountain, where they hope to achieve enlightenment.

9.name: Live and Let Die
9.description: 007 is sent to stop a diabolically brilliant heroin magnate armed with a complex organization and a reliable psychic tarot card reader.

10.name: Shaft in Africa
10.description: Private investigator John Shaft is recruited to go undercover to break up a modern slavery ring where young Africans are lured to Paris to do chain-gang work.

11.name: Soylent Green
11.description: In the world ravaged by the greenhouse effect and overpopulation, an NYPD detective investigates the murder of a big company CEO.

12.name: Badlands
12.description: An impressionable teenage girl from a dead-end town and her older greaser boyfriend embark on a killing spree in the South Dakota badlands.

13.name: Westworld
13.description: A robot malfunction creates havoc and terror for unsuspecting vacationers at a futuristic, adult-themed amusement park.

14.name: Enter the Dragon
14.description: A martial artist agrees to spy on a reclusive crime lord using his invitation to a tournament there as cover.

15.name: Robin Hood
15.description: The story of the legendary outlaw is portrayed with the characters as humanoid animals.

16.name: Serpico
16.description: An honest New York cop named Frank Serpico blows the whistle on rampant corruption in the force only to have his comrades turn against him.

17.name: High Plains Drifter
17.description: A gunfighting stranger comes to the small settlement of Lago and is hired to bring the townsfolk together in an attempt to hold off three outlaws who are on their way.

18.name: Contes immoraux
18.description: An erotic collection of short stories, an anthology comprised of tantalizing tales about sexual desire and its diverse manifestations.

19.name: The Long Goodbye
19.description: Private investigator Philip Marlowe helps a friend out of a jam then gets implicated in his wife's murder.

20.name: The Way We Were
20.description: Two disparate people have a wonderful romance, but their political views and convictions drive them apart.

21.name: Paper Moon
21.description: During the Great Depression, a con man finds himself saddled with a young girl who may or may not be his daughter, and the two forge an unlikely partnership.

22.name: Magnum Force
22.description: Dirty Harry is on the trail of vigilante cops who are not above going beyond the law to kill the city's undesirables.

23.name: The Day of the Jackal
23.description: A professional assassin codenamed "Jackal" plots to kill Charles de Gaulle, the President of France.

24.name: The Three Musketeers
24.description: A young swordsman comes to Paris and faces villains, romance, adventure and intrigue with three Musketeer friends.

25.name: The Crazies
25.description: The military attempts to contain a manmade combat virus that causes death and permanent insanity in those infected, as it overtakes a small Pennsylvania town.

26.name: La planète sauvage
26.description: On a faraway planet where blue giants rule, oppressed humanoids rebel against their machine-like leaders.

27.name: The Last Detail
27.description: Two Navy men are ordered to bring a young offender to prison, but decide to show him one last good time along the way.

28.name: Walking Tall
28.description: Based on the life of Tennessee sheriff Buford Pusser whom almost single-handily cleaned up his small town of crime and corruption, but at a personal cost of his family life and nearly his own life.

29.name: Il mio nome è Nessuno
29.description: A young, easygoing gunman (Hill) worships and competes with an old gunfighter (Fonda) who only wants to retire.

30.name: Scarecrow
30.description: Max, an ex-con drifter with a penchant for brawling is amused by Lion, a homeless ex-sailor, and they partner up as they head east together.

31.name: Jesus Christ Superstar
31.description: Film version of the musical stage play, presenting the last few weeks of Christ's life told in an anachronistic manner.

32.name: Charlotte's Web
32.description: A gentle and wise grey spider with a flair for promotion pledges to save a young pig from slaughter for dinner food.

33.name: Cahill U.S. Marshal
33.description: A tough Marshal has a difficult task when his two sons join a gang and rob a bank.

34.name: Pat Garrett & Billy the Kid
34.description: Pat Garrett is hired as a lawman on behalf of a group of wealthy New Mexico cattle barons to bring down his old friend Billy the Kid.

35.name: Amarcord
35.description: A series of comedic and nostalgic vignettes set in a 1930s Italian coastal town.

36.name: Turks fruit
36.description: A young love must struggle against an old problems.

37.name: Coffy
37.description: A black nurse takes vigilante justice against inner-city drug dealers after her sister becomes their latest victim.

38.name: La nuit américaine
38.description: A committed film director struggles to complete his movie while coping with a myriad of crises, personal and professional, among the cast and crew.

39.name: Anita
39.description: Anita is a girl of only teenage years, and while she has developed early physically, to a mature woman, she is emotionally struggling. Her relationship with her parents and her friends is ...                See full summary »

40.name: La grande bouffe
40.description: A group of men go to a villa in the French countryside where they resolve to eat themselves to death.

41.name: The Vault of Horror
41.description: An anthology of five horror stories shared by five men trapped in the basement of an office building.

42.name: The Mack
42.description: Goldie returns from five years at the state pen and winds up King of the pimping game. Trouble comes in the form of two corrupt white cops and a crime lord who wants him to return to the ...                See full summary »

43.name: The Legend of Hell House
43.description: Physicist Lionel Barrett and his wife lead a team of mediums into the Belasco House, which is supposedly haunted by the victims of its late owner, a six-foot-five serial killer.

44.name: Electra Glide in Blue
44.description: Bored with his highway traffic duties, Arizona motorcycle patrolman John Wintergreen is assigned to Homicide where his polite investigative style irks his macho boss.

45.name: The Golden Voyage of Sinbad
45.description: Sinbad and the vizier of Marabia, followed by evil magician Koura, seek the three golden tablets that can gain them access to the ancient temple of the Oracle of All Knowledge.

46.name: Sleeper
46.description: A nerdish store owner is revived out of cryostasis into a future world to fight an oppressive government.

47.name: That'll Be the Day
47.description: Abandoned by his father at an early age, Jim MacLaine seems to have inherited the old man's restlessness. Despite his apparent intelligence, Jim decides not to take the exams that would ...                See full summary »

48.name: Thriller - en grym film
48.description: A young woman, muted after a sexual assault as a child, is trained to seek violent revenge on those who have wronged her after being kidnapped and forced to work as a prostitute.

49.name: Kanashimi no beradonna
49.description: An evil feudal lord rapes a village girl on her wedding night and proceeds to ruin her and her husband's lives. After she's eventually banished from her village, the girl makes a pact with the devil to gain magical ability and take revenge.

50.name: I corpi presentano tracce di violenza carnale
50.description: A string of appalling lust murders shocks the University of Perugia as a sadistic serial killer strangles to death beautiful college girls with a red and black scarf.
